description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableContract.withdraw() (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#16-25):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call{value: amount}() (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] = 0 (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#24)
	VulnerableContract.balances (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#7) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VulnerableContract.deposit() (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#11-14)
	- VulnerableContract.withdraw() (../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#16-25)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [VulnerableContract.withdraw()](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L16-L25):
	External calls:
	- [(success) = msg.sender.call{value: amount}()](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balances[msg.sender] = 0](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L24)
	[VulnerableContract.balances](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L7) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [VulnerableContract.deposit()](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L11-L14)
	- [VulnerableContract.withdraw()](../../../../../../../tmp/aegis_runs/contract_test-pipeline-001.sol#L16-L25)
